data.description:
IONIA™ is an hour-long single-player interactive story for all ages. Get up close with music-inspired creatures in a lush forest teeming with life. Discover music-based magic on your quest to save the Harpa, a mythical creature whose habitat is on the brink of destruction. Every purchase will benefit real-world wildlife, with 5% of proceeds going directly to the Steve & Terri Irwin Foundation, Wildlife Warriors Worldwide.

The Harpa is the heart of the Ionian forest. With every tree felled by the approaching Tritone army, her spirit weakens. You and your sister Allegra are Ionia’s brave new heroes, embarking on a quest to heal this mythical creature with the power of music before it’s too late. 

Inspired by music mythology, Ionia is a fantasy world brimming with interactive plant and animal life. Find food for glowing Ocarinas, see breathtaking vistas, climb vines in the canopy of ancient trees, and discover the depths of a watery cave.

changelog.change_log:
Additional environmental Art and interactive foliage added
Added In-game options, including a smooth locomotion toggle, input, audio, and more
Added a scene skip feature 
Added height adjustment slider to the in-game menu
Removed red X from non-locomotion areas when using teleport
customized color and transparency of teleport arch
Expanded the first room in Ionia to include secret hallways
Interactive astroids added to the dream sequence, Myth of Pan
The difficulty of the Tablet Puzzle has increased
Finding Slug Fruit to feed the Ocarina is redesigned to extend exploration

Shout out to everyone on our Discord and feedback from reviews for helping make Ionia even better. Many more features and expansion of gameplay are on the way!
